chargeHist.descr: Possess Drug Paraphernalia to Manufacture, Compound, Convert, Produce, or Store Methamphetamine

result.execSummary:
The defendant Katie E Bundy was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Katie E Bundy is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Katie E Bundy was found guilty of Possession of Methamphetamine, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(g).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

(9:35)   MULTIPLE CASES HEARD.

Amann - argues sentence - credit 84 days

COURT:  
14CF81 Ct 3 - w/held sentence 42 months probation - 
$268 cc, $250 dna surchg

assess, DNA sample, maint. sobriety, allows part. in treatment court

14CF225 Ct 1 - w/held sentence 42 months probation

1 yr cond jail month - 3 mo to serv 9 months stayed - forthwith

14CF55 Ct 1 - w/held sentence 42 months probation
